name: Dior Sauvage
description1: A raw, noble spirit born from the wide-open desert beneath a blue sky.
description2: Dior Sauvage Eau de Parfum is a powerful and fresh composition. It features the juicy freshness of Reggio Bergamot and the mysterious trail of an Ambery woodiness. In 2026, it remains a global icon for the man who is true to himself.

name: Denver Esteem
description1: The silent confidence of a gentleman, captured in a bottle.
description2: Denver Esteem expresses the genius of contrast and well-mastered emotions. This Eau de Parfum is an aromatic spicy blend of fresh bergamot and sharp lavender with a hint of pepper, resting on a base of patchouli and musk for the modern man.

name: Chanel No. 5
description1: The very essence of femininity; an abstract bouquet that changed the world.
description2: Created in 1921, Chanel No. 5 remains the most famous perfume in history. This Parfum version is a complex blend of May Rose, Jasmine, and unique Aldehydes that give it an incomparable airy sparkle.

name: Versace Eros
description1: A hymn of love from the heart of the Mediterranean.
description2: Versace Eros is a vibrant, glowing fragrance. It interprets masculine power through a luminous aura of intense freshness obtained from the combination of mint leaves, Italian lemon zest, and green apple.

name: Chanel Coco Noir
description1: Magnetic sensuality told in a modern, luminous Oriental tale.
description2: Coco Noir celebrates the paradox of black, using it to highlight a woman's dazzling femininity. It features a sophisticated burst of Bergamot and a generous heart of May Rose and Rose Geranium leaf.

name: Tom Ford Black Orchid
description1: A luxe, alluring potion of dark orchids and rich spice.
description2: Tom Ford Black Orchid is an iconic, deeply seductive fragrance. It blends aphrodisiac black truffle and sparkling ylang-ylang with bergamot and bitter orange, creating a dark, earthy, and floral signature.

name: Tom Ford Oud Wood
description1: Rare, exotic, and distinctive; a journey into a smoking incense-filled temple.
description2: One of the most popular private blend fragrances, Oud Wood features rare oud, sandalwood, and chinese pepper. It is a pioneering composition of smoky, woody notes and warm amber.

name: Terre d'Hermes
description1: A dialogue between man and earth; the scent of the horizon.
description2: Terre d’Hermès is a symbolic narrative exploring raw materials and their metamorphosis. A woody, vegetal, and mineral fragrance that combines the strength of flint with the vibrancy of grapefruit and pepper.

name: Twilly d'Hermes
description1: A daring spirit of ginger and tuberose for the free-spirited woman.
description2: Twilly d’Hermès is a floral, spicy Eau de Parfum. It is woven with ginger, tuberose, and sandalwood—reinvented to form an unexpected, mischievous, and irreverent combination.

name: Givenchy L'Interdit
description1: A tribute to bold femininity; an invitation to defy convention.
description2: L'Interdit is a white floral fragrance cut with dark notes. It creates a shocking chic effect through the blend of orange blossom, jasmine, and tuberose with earthy vetiver and patchouli.

name: Chanel No. 5 (Eau de Parfum)
description1: A modern interpretation of the world's most iconic fragrance.
description2: The Eau de Parfum draws inspiration from the Parfum. This floral bouquet composed around May Rose and Jasmine features bright citrus top notes. Aldehydes create a unique presence, while the smooth touch of Bourbon Vanilla leaves an incredibly sensual trail.

name: Emporio Armani Stronger With You
description1: A spicy, ambery fragrance that lives in the present.
description2: Stronger With You is an energetic fragrance for men. It features a unique blend of cardamom, pink pepper, and violet leaves, with a smoky Vanilla Jungle Essence and sugar-coated chestnut accord.

name: Dior Fahrenheit
description1: A legendary signature where flower meets leather and woods.
description2: Dior Fahrenheit is a fragrance of extremes. It is built around a vibrant, sensual accord of Violet and Leather, enhanced by Bourbon Vanilla absolute for an addictive and magnetic trail.

name: MIX:BAR Glass Rose No. 11
description1: A crystal-clear modern rose, light as a morning dew drop.
description2: Glass Rose No. 11 is a fresh-cut green stem and bitter herbal rose. It opens with refreshing bergamot and raspberry, revealing a heart of pink rose blooms on a base of amberwood and moss. An abstract bouquet in clear, frigid water.

name: Davidoff Cool Water (Classic)
description1: The quintessential aromatic aquatic fragrance for the modern man.
description2: Launched in 1988, this fragrance remains a staple. It opens with fresh sea water, lavender, and mint, settling into a masculine base of sandalwood, tobacco, and oakmoss.

name: Davidoff Cool Water (Reborn)
description1: A cleaner, greener ocean; a new era of freshness.
description2: Cool Water Reborn is a modern reimagining of the 1988 classic. It features ethically sourced ingredients including galbanum and cedarwood, blended with the signature oceanic accord for a deeper, more sustainable scent profile.

name: Hugo Boss Bottled
description1: The scent of success; a noble composition for the ambitious man.
description2: Boss Bottled Eau de Parfum reveals an intense masculinity. It awakens the senses with a burst of apple and bergamot, contrasted with essence of black pepper and a spicy heart of cinnamon oils.
